text: Fernanda Maria Young de Carvalho Machado (née Leite Young; 1 May 1970 – 25 August 2019), commonly known as Fernanda Young, was a Brazilian writer, screenwriter, television presenter, model and actress. She was born in Niterói, Rio de Janeiro. She was known for starring and creating Os Normais and Como Aproveitar o Fim do Mundo. Young died at a hospital in Paraisópolis, Minas Gerais from cardiopulmonary arrest caused by asthma at the age of 49. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Deaths from asthma Category:Brazilian screenwriters Category:Brazilian television presenters Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian models Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro Category:People from Niterói
title: Fernanda Young
